statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT behavior_analysis, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_analysis FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback, behavior_analysis FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE behavior_analysis LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT behavior_analysis FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback) > 50;
SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE id > 5;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%good%';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE 'Great%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY behavior_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(id) AS avg_feedback_id FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(LENGTH(feedback)) AS max_feedback_length FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_feedback_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM CustomerBehavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, message_text FROM CampaignMessaging WHERE message_text LIKE '%special%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehavior JOIN CustomerFeedback ON CustomerBehavior.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase';
SELECT campaign_id, message_text FROM CampaignMessaging WHERE send_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_analysis WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, message_text FROM messaging_history WHERE message_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY message_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_rating, analysis_date FROM feedback_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_strategy WHERE target_location = 'New York';
SELECT message_text, message_date FROM messaging_history WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY message_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM Customer WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(recorded_at) AS latest_behavior FROM Behavior GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT behavior_type, recorded_at FROM Behavior WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT message_text, sent_at FROM Message WHERE campaign_id = 3 AND sent_at BETWEEN '2023-06-01' AND '2023-06-30';
